channel.title: Donator Ticket
channel.description: Hey guys i have a question how would i make a donator ticket that will promote you and delete after you use it? I have the ticket already in the client and first option when you right click is "Promote" Thanks for help

item.title: Donator Ticket
item.dc:creator: @Vodzila Vodzila
item.description:
@Vodzila wrote:

i don’t have clickitem i have clickingmost when i added it in there i get error compiling

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Ticket
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Atreyu1993, post:3, topic:430156”]In ClickItem class add

if (itemId == Whatever ID the item Is) { c.isDonator = true;//Assuming your using a common PI Source, i believe they use this. c.playerRights = 4;//Or whatever playerRights your donator status is c.logout();//So your donator symbol will show, they have to relog. }[/quote]Dude he just explained it

Read full topic

item.description:
@Vodzila wrote:

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Ticket
item.dc:creator: @Atreyu1993 Atreyu1993
item.description:
@Atreyu1993 wrote:

In ClickItem class add

if (itemId == Whatever ID the item Is) { c.isDonator = true;//Assuming your using a common PI Source, i believe they use this. c.playerRights = 4;//Or whatever playerRights your donator status is c.logout();//So your donator symbol will show, they have to relog. }

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Ticket
item.dc:creator: @dylan.hurley dylan.hurley
item.description:
@dylan.hurley wrote:

I don’t haw my codes but in case you need to add
c.IsDonator = 1;
And
c.getItems().removeItem((Item id),1);
That all I think

Read full topic
